Question: CES Live! - West Broadcast Tower CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dell/Alienware

Alienware 32-inch 4K QD-OLED gaming monitor

 - First 4K QD-OLED gaming monitor
 - Supports Dolby Vision
 - 240Hz refresh rate

Victrola

Victrola Stream Sapphire

 - Wireless turntable
 - Features Sonos, UPnP, and Roon connectivity
 - Equipped with an Ortofon 2M Blue phono cartridge
 - Priced at $1,500

LG

Transparent OLED TV

 - Demonstrated at the event (no further details provided)
